english.segment1: Drop the ball, watch it fall far below. Suck you in, hold your breath. The undertow creeps in slow. Everyone owns a gun deep inside. It's just a matter of how much you let it slide
english.segment2: Help me, help you. They won't be there. Help me, help you. They won't see
english.segment3: It hurts when you need me. And I can't break your fall. And it hurts when you can't see. And it hurts
english.segment4: Drop the switch, scratch the itch, watch it glow. inch by inch, the cutting board. Watch it swing to and fro. Everyone carries one deep inside. It's just a matter of how much you let it slide
english.segment5: And it hurts when you're lonely. And I'm standing right beside you there. And it hurts when you told me. That you'll try this on your own
english.segment6: Hope you never hurt, hope you never cry. Hope you never lose your way tonight. Hope you never crumble, hope you never fall. Hope you never throw away it
english.segment7: Drop the ball, watch it fall below far below. Suck you in, hold your breath, watch it swing
